get.description: Retrieves all delegacy details  - الاستعلام عن كافة بيانات التفويض الالكتروني

parameters.name: idtype
parameters.description:
identification type - نوع هوية المفوض:
      * `nid` - citizen national ID  - هوية سعودية
      * `iqama` - Iqama Number - هوية إقامة

THIQAH-API-ClientMsgRef.description: The original client reference value sent in the request

get.summary: Retrieves all delegates details for beneficiary
get.description:
Retrieves all delegates details for beneficiary - الاستعلام عن كافة بيانات التفاويض الالكترونية لمفوَّض:
**Note**: either (delegatedReferenceId with delegatedReferencetype) is required  or (inquiryId with inquirytype) or (both of them)

parameters.name: idtype
parameters.description:
identification type - نوع هوية المفوض:
      * `nid` - citizen national ID  - هوية سعودية
      * `iqama` - Iqama Number - هوية إقامة

parameters.name: delegatedReferenceId
parameters.description: refers to delegated on reference id    - رقم المرجع الخاص بالجهة المفوض عليها

parameters.name: delegatedReferencetype
parameters.description:
refers to delegated on reference type -نوع المرجع الخاص بالجهة المفوض عليها:
    * `crno` - commercial registration  - سجل تجاري
    * `entityno` - entity number like 7XXXXXXXXX - الرقم الوطني الموحد
    * `agency` - Agency  - الوكالة التجارية
    * `trademark` - Trade mark- العلامة التجارية

parameters.name: inquirytype
parameters.description:
inquiry type - نوع الاستعلام:
      * `role` - role  - صلاحية
      * `system` - system  - خدمة

THIQAH-API-ClientMsgRef.description: The original client reference value sent in the request

get.summary: Retrieves all beneficiaries and delegates details for reference
get.description: Retrieves all beneficiaries and  delegates details refers to delegated on reference id - الاستعلام عن كافة بيانات المفوضَّين والتفاويض الالكترونية المرتبطة بجهه مفوض عليها

parameters.description: refers to delegated on reference id    - رقم المرجع الخاص بالجهة المفوض عليها

    * `entityno` - entity number like 7XXXXXXXXX - الرقم الوطني الموحد
    * `agency` - Agency  - الوكالة التجارية
    * `trademark` - Trade mark- العلامة التجارية

parameters.name: inquirytype
parameters.description:
inquiry type - نوع الاستعلام:
      * `role` - role  - صلاحية
      * `system` - system  - خدمة

DefaultErrorResponse.description:
Supported HTTP Status Codes 400, 401, 403, 404, 409, 429, 500, 502, 503, 504

400 Bad Request - Will be returned for any data processing errors which API consumer should correct.
401 Unauthorized - Authentication errors. Credentials provided are not valid or expired.
403 Forbidden - Authorization error. Credentials are valid, but insufficient privileges or scope.
404 Not Found - Resource/verb combination is not found.
409 Conflict - The operation is creating a conflict in the resource status
500 Internal Server Error - Internal errors within the API provider and its backends
502 Bad Gateway - The backend application provider did not provide a valid undestandable response
503 Service Unavailable - API resource is not available for use and/or one of the backend providers is not available.
504 Gateway Timeout - The backend application provider did not provide a response within the Standard timeout window.

ErrorResponse400_delegate.description:
**business error , Here is listed of code** :

  code: 400.2.3  - message: Input data is required
  code: 400.2.19 - message: Wrong Beneficiary Identity Type 
  code: 400.2.25 - message: delegacy ID must be more than 2 digits
  code: 400.2.26 - message: beneficiary id must be 10 digits only
  code: 400.2.27 - message: beneficiary id must be in valid format
  code: 400.2.32 - message: delegacy is expired

ErrorResponse400_beneficiary.description:
**business error , Here is listed of code** :

  code: 400.2.19 - message: Wrong Beneficiary Identity Type
  code: 400.2.26 - message: beneficiary id must be 10 digits only
  code: 400.2.27 - message: beneficiary id must be in valid format
  code: 400.2.28 - message: delegated reference id must be 10 digits only
  code: 400.2.29 - message: Wrong Inquiry Type
  code: 400.2.30 - message: Wrong Reference Type
  code: 400.2.31 - message: Input data is required either [(delegatedReferenceId with delegatedReferencetype), (inquiryId with inquirytype) or (both of them)]
